decision_conditions: The applicant has not demonstrated how the requirements of the condition have been met and as such the LPA is not satisfied that the removal of the condition would accord with the reason for the imposition of the condition to ensure the development's sustainability credentials and energy conservation.
description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 14 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) for Application Reference Number: 22/02199/FUL (Application under Section 73A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 20/01970/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Application ref:18/14294/FUL (Demolition of the existing detached bungalow and the erection of two 5 bedroom detached houses, with associated vehicular access, off-street parking, and landscaping) dated 18/05/2018. Alterations to include changes to fascia materials and fenestration positions) dated 18/11/2020. Variation to include alteration of parking space positions and relocation of vehicle crossover, provide the correct legal segregation of each dwellings demise, locate parking spaces away from RPA and provision of maximum cable length distance for electric charging points from the dwellings to each vehicle) dated 28/09/2022. Variation to remove the requirement for CO2 reductions as this requirement is superseded by building regulations approvals.
